description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. ColorBox is a unique puzzle game combining millions of colors across four challenging game modes.  Best your friends in ColorBox's Versus mode, or sit back and relax and enjoy Four Seasons mode where you travel through four color-themed seasons. It's fun for the whole brain!
description.short: ColorBox is a unique puzzle game combining millions of colors across four challenging game modes.  Best your friends in ColorBox's Versus mode, or sit back and relax and enjoy Four Seasons mode where you travel through four color-themed seasons. It's fun for the whole brain!
